item.title: How do i make unsafe zones?
item.dc:creator: @killer_numba_1 killer numba 1
item.description:
@killer_numba_1 wrote:

[quote=“wtffab, post:2, topic:45334”]Just search for “(absX >” and when you get to to erase everything that has that code and everything will be unsafe kk hope i helped
Proud owner of EdandMike Scape[/quote]

Lol. Im sure that didnt help him. you just explained how to find it.[br][size=1]Posted on: April 05, 2007, 06:02:46 PM[/size][hr]public boolean nonWild() {
if((absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3258 && absY >= 3438 && absY <=3431 ) || (absX >= 2668 && absX <= 2683 && absY >= 3414 && absY <= 3429) || (absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3260 && absY >=3435 && absY <=3437 ) || (absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3253 && absY >=3431 && absY <=3437 ) || (absX >=3250 && absX <=3257 && absY >=3419 && absY <=3423 ) ||(absX >=3250 && absX <=3257 && absY >=3419 && absY <=3423 )||
heightLevel == 1)
return true;
else
return false;
}

This is an example…
X-> **** **** <-X… the * represents the coordnates of the Most Souther Western place you want
Y-> **** **** <-Y… the * represents the coordnates of the Most Northern Eastern place you want

Put it all together ( like the example i gave u) and there u have it.
